name: Survival Simulator VR
description: A sand-box virtual reality survival game. See if you can survive stranded on an island with only the objects you can scavenge or craft from resources available on the island.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-7500 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
